text: Ashokante Aswathikuttikku is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Vijayan Karote, starring Ashokan and Parvathi Jayaram in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Ashokan as Ashokan * MG Soman * Parvathi Jayaram as Aswathi * Seema * Jagathy Sreekumar * Innocent * Thilakan * Adoor Bhasi * Sankaradi * Baby Chaithanya * Devan * Ravi Menon * Santhakumari * VK Sreeraman * Valsala Menon * Jayalalitha * Bhagyalakshmi (actress) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
title: Ashokante Aswathikuttikku
